Title: Reduces a retired or disabled owner's no fault insurance premium by providing appropriate automobile insurance rates to reflect a reduced exposure to loss
Summary: Reduces a retired or disabled owner's no fault insurance premium by providing appropriate automobile insurance rates to reflect a reduced exposure to loss due to situations where drivers either have no wages to lose or are covered for lost wages by another first payer insurance policy; defines "retired" and "disabled".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to automobile insurance rates for persons who are retired or disabled
